definitions: the quality or condition of being of or at a low or relatively low temperature, especially when compared with the human body

examples.text: the air returned to the bright coldness of winter
the bitter coldness of the British weather

shortDefinitions: quality or condition of being of or at low or relatively low temperature

definitions: a feeling of fear or horror

examples.text: a sudden coldness crept around his heart

definitions: the quality of lacking affection or warmth of feeling

examples.text: he replied with coldness in his voice

shortDefinitions: quality of lacking affection or warmth of feeling

definitions: (in reference to color) the quality of containing pale blue or gray
shortDefinitions: the quality of containing pale blue or grey
